SourceProxy.name: BOVReader
SourceProxy.label: SQ BOV Reader
SourceProxy.Documentation: long_help="BOV Reader. Reads raw or brick of values files in parallel handles time."

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the reader.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimestepValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Available timestep values.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property is used to select arrays to read in.

IntVectorProperty.name: ISubset
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls what subset of data is read in. Subset for smaller memory footprint and better interactivity.

IntVectorProperty.name: JSubset
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls what subset of data is read in. Subset for smaller memory footprint and better interactivity.

IntVectorProperty.name: KSubset
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls what subset of data is read in. Subset for smaller memory footprint and better interactivity.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCollectiveIO
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off MPI-IO collective buffering.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfIONodes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of IO nodes. Set to 0 to use the implementation default.

IntVectorProperty.name: CollectBufferSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the size of the buffer for aggregation. Set to 0 to use the implementation default.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseDataSieving
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off MPI-IO collective buffering.

IntVectorProperty.name: SieveBufferSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the size of the buffer for sieving. Set to 0 to use the implementation default.

IntVectorProperty.name: MetaRead
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked meta mode is active. Meta data will be read and processed however actual read will be deffered to down stream filters. If unchecked the reader performs as expected, an actual read of the requested arrays.

SourceProxy.name: BOVMetaReader
SourceProxy.label: SQ BOV Meta Reader
SourceProxy.Documentation: long_help="BOV Reader. Reads raw or brick of values files in parallel handles time."

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the reader.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimestepValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Available timestep values.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property is used to select arrays to read in.

IntVectorProperty.name: ISubset
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set data subset range in the z direction.

IntVectorProperty.name: JSubset
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set data subset range in the y direction.

IntVectorProperty.name: KSubset
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set data subset range in the z direction.

IntVectorProperty.name: XPeriodic
IntVectorProperty.label: Periodic in X
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Apply periodic boundary condition in the x direction during integration.

IntVectorProperty.name: YPeriodic
IntVectorProperty.label: Periodic in Y
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Apply periodic boundary condition in the y direction during integration.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZPeriodic
IntVectorProperty.label: Periodic in Z
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Apply periodic boundary condition in the z direction during integration.

IntVectorProperty.name: NGhosts
IntVectorProperty.label: Number of ghost cells
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Number of ghost cells to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: DecompDims
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of blocks to be used in an out of core read. If the second and thrid dimension are zero then the first is treated as a number of blocks and a decomposition is generated.

IntVectorProperty.name: BlockCacheSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of blocks to cache during out of core operation. Increasing the number of blocks cached improves the perforomance but increases the memory footprint.

IntVectorProperty.name: ClearCachedBlocks
IntVectorProperty.label: Clear Cached Blocks
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If set the block cache is explcitly cleared after each pipeline update.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCollectiveIO
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off MPI-IO collective buffering.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfIONodes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of IO nodes. Set to 0 to use the implementation default.

IntVectorProperty.name: CollectBufferSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the size of the buffer for aggregation. Set to 0 to use the implementation default.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseDataSieving
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off MPI-IO collective buffering.

IntVectorProperty.name: SieveBufferSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the size of the buffer for sieving. Set to 0 to use the implementation default.

IntVectorProperty.name: MetaRead
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked meta mode is active. Meta data will be read and processed however actual read will be deffered to down stream filters. If unchecked the reader performs as expected, an actual read of the requested arrays.

SourceProxy.name: vtkSQPlaneSource
SourceProxy.label: SQ Plane Source

Documentation.long_help: Create a parallelogram given an origin and two points. The resolution indicates the number of division along each axis of the plane.
Documentation.short_help: Create a parallelogram from an origin and two points

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Plane source can be used to add a polygonal parallelogram to the 3D scene.

StringVectorProperty.name: Name
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Give the object a name that may be used downstream to identify it.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Origin
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the 3D coordinate of the origin (one corner) of the plane.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Point1
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the 3D coordinate a second corner of the parallelogram.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Point2
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the 3D coordinate a third corner of the parallelogram.

IntVectorProperty.name: XResolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the number of divisions along the X axis of the parallelogram.

IntVectorProperty.name: YResolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the number of divisions along the Y axis of the parallelogram.

SourceProxy.name: vtkSQSphereSource
SourceProxy.label: SQ Sphere Source

Documentation.long_help: Create a 3D sphere given a center and radius.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Sphere source can be used to add a polygonal sphere to the 3D scene. The output of the Sphere source is polygonal data with point normals defined.

StringVectorProperty.name: Name
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Give the object a name that may be used downstream to identify it.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Center
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the 3D coordinates for the center of the sphere.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the radius of the sphere.

IntVectorProperty.name: ThetaResolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property represents the number of divisions between Start Theta and End Theta around the sphere. (See the Start Theta and End Theta properties.) The theta divisions are similar to longitude lines on the earth. The higher the resolution, the closer the approximation will come to a sphere, and the more polygons there will be.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: StartTheta
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: To form a complete sphere, the value of this property should be 0 degrees, and the value of the End Theta property should be 360 degrees. The value of this property can be adjusted to form only a portion of a sphere.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EndTheta
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property can be adjusted to form only a portion of a sphere. This value is measured in degrees.

IntVectorProperty.name: PhiResolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property represents the number of divisions between Start Phi and End Phi on the sphere. (See the Start Phi and End Phi properties.) The phi divisions are similar to latitude lines on the earth.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: StartPhi
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: To form a complete sphere, the value of this property should be 0 degrees, and the value of the End Phi property should be 180 degrees. The value of this property can be adjusted to form only a portion of a sphere. Set the starting angle (in degrees) in the latitudinal direction.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EndPhi
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property can be adjusted to form only a portion of a sphere. The value is measured in degrees.

SourceProxy.name: vtkSQHemisphereSource
SourceProxy.label: SQ Hemisphere Source

Documentation.long_help: Create a 3D sphere given a center and radius.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Hemisphere source can be used to add a polygonal sphere to the 3D scene. The output of the Hemisphere source is polygonal data with point normals defined.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Center
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the 3D coordinates for the center of the sphere.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the radius of the sphere.

IntVectorProperty.name: Resolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property controls the number of lat-lon linies in the output.

SourceProxy.name: vtkSQProcessMonitor
SourceProxy.label: SQ Process Monitor

Documentation.long_help: A custom Qt panel that manages and monitors the running processes.
Documentation.short_help: A custom Qt panel that manages and monitors the running processes.

SourceProxy.Documentation: A custom panel that manages and monitors the running processes.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableBacktraceHandler
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable a signal handler that prints a backtrace.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableFE_DIVBYZERO
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Trap divide by zero FPE.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableFE_INEXACT
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Trap inexact FPE.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableFE_INVALID
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Trap invalid FPE.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableFE_OVERFLOW
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Trap overflow FPE.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableFE_UNDERFLOW
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Trap underflow FPE.

InputProperty.name: SeedPointInput
InputProperty.label: Seed Cells
InputProperty.Documentation: Cells to generate seed points from (at cell center).

InputProperty.name: TerminatorInput
InputProperty.label: Terminator Surfaces
InputProperty.Documentation: Surfaces which if present stop field line integration when a field line crosses one.

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputVectors
StringVectorProperty.label: Vectors
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the name of the vector array from which to generate streamlines.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxStep
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Max Step Size
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum integration step size as a multiple of cell lengths.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxLineLength
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Max Arc Length
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum streamline arc length beyond which line integration is terminated.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NullThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Null Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Vector field magnitude below which particle advection/integration is terminated.

IntVectorProperty.name: SqueezeColorMap
IntVectorProperty.label: Squeeze Color Map
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use the minimum number of intersect colors required. Requires global reduction.

IntVectorProperty.name: Mode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the mode of operation to one of STREAM,TOPOLOGY,POINCARE.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseDynamicScheduler
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set the work is by a simple self-scheduling algorithm. In this case all of the seed source data has to be duplicated on all processes. This must be off if this is not the case. Set once before the filter runs.

IntVectorProperty.name: MasterBlockSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Controls how much work the master does in between servicing work requests from the workers. Should be much smaller the WorkerBlockSize.

IntVectorProperty.name: WorkerBlockSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Controls how much work is given to the worker processes at each request.

InputProperty.name: SeedPointInput
InputProperty.label: Seed Cells
InputProperty.Documentation: Cells to generate seed points from (at cell center).

InputProperty.name: TerminatorInput

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxStep

DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum integration step size as a multiple of cell lengths.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxError
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Error bound for adaptive step size integration.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: MaxNumberOfSteps
IdTypeVectorProperty.label: Max Number of Steps
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum number of steps, beyond which integration is terminated.

DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum streamline arc length beyond which line integration is terminated.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NullThreshold

DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Vector field magnitude below which particle advection/integration is terminated.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxError

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: MaxNumberOfSteps
IdTypeVectorProperty.label: Max Step Sizes
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum number of steps, beyond which integration is terminated.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxLineLength
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Max Arc Length
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum streamline arc length beyond which line integration is terminated.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NullThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Null Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Vector field magnitude below which particle advection/integration is terminated.

IntVectorProperty.name: Mode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the mode of operation to one of STREAM,TOPOLOGY,POINCARE.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseDynamicScheduler
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set the work is by a simple self-scheduling algorithm. In this case all of the seed source data has to be duplicated on all processes. This must be off if this is not the case. Set once before the filter runs.

IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Controls how much work the master does in between servicing work requests from the workers. Should be much smaller the WorkerBlockSize.

IntVectorProperty.name: WorkerBlockSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Controls how much work is given to the worker processes at each request.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the Warp (vector) filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputVectors
StringVectorProperty.label: Vectors
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Identifies the vector field on which to operate.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeRotation
IntVectorProperty.label: Rotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Compute the rotation (curl) of the vector field using a point centered stencil.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeHelicity
IntVectorProperty.label: Helicity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Compute the helicity (dot of vector and its curl) of the vector field using a point centered stencil.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeNormalizedHelicity
IntVectorProperty.label: Normalized helicity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Compute the normailzed helicity of the vector field using a point centered stencil.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeLambda
IntVectorProperty.label: Lambda-(1,2,3)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Compute the 3 eigenvalues of corrected pressure hessian.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeLambda2
IntVectorProperty.label: Lambda-2
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Compute the second eigenvalue of corrected pressure hessian.

SourceProxy.name: vtkSQSeedPointLatice
SourceProxy.label: SQ Seed Point Latice
SourceProxy.Documentation: Generates vertices on a latice. The latice can either be unifomrly space or non-linearly stretched independently in each direction.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: IBounds
DoubleVectorProperty.label: X Range
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls the bounds of the seed points.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: JBounds
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Y Range
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls the bounds of the seed points.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: KBounds
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Z Range
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls the bounds of the seed points.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TransformPower
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Transform Power
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Controls how non-linear the generated points are. 0 is linear.
